pkgmetadata.longdescription: # daylight-factorDaylight factor recipe for PollinationUse this recipe to calculate daylight factor for a Honeybee model or zippedhoneybee-radiance folder.You can only use a Honeybee model when using the `-viz` tag.[Daylight factor recipe on Pollination](https://app.pollination.cloud/ladybug-tools/recipes/daylight-factor/latest?tab=graph)
